news.title: 25 years GNU = 25% discount for 25 days
news.body: To celebrate the 25th birthday of the GNU Project on 27th September, FSFE offers a 25% discount on its merchandise starting 22th September until 16th October. So this offer is up for 25 days. One day and one percent for every year of GNU! (Attention: FSFE cannot give a discount on the shipping.)
